Title: Directs the commissioner of health to conduct a study on the use of ibogaine as a treatment for post-traumatic stress disorder
Summary: Directs the commissioner of health, in conjunction with the commissioners of mental health and veterans' services, to conduct a study on the use of ibogaine as a treatment for post-traumatic stress disorder, and the increasing rate of PTSD diagnoses in veterans and first responders.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to to directing the commissioner of health to conduct a study on the use of ibogaine as a treatment for post-traumatic stress disorder
